aka: Rioja: The Land of a Thousand Wines

writer.name: 何塞·路易斯·洛佩斯-利纳雷斯 José Luis López-Linares

director.name: 何塞·路易斯·洛佩斯-利纳雷斯 José Luis López-Linares

this_title: Rioja, la tierra de los mil vinos
trans_title: Rioja: The Land of a Thousand Wines
introduction: Through mesmerizing images of the whole winemaking process and the testimonies of winemakers, sommeliers, enologists, and restaurateurs from La Rioja, this is a sumptuous invitation to enjoy the surprising variety and delicious secrets behind Spain’s most well-known wine.
foreign_title: Rioja, la tierra de los mil vinos
